Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Snagost, Kursk regio...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces captured Makhnovka, Sudzha direction, in the Kursk region of Russia. Russian forces also captured all the area south of Koronevo and entered Snagost, making the town a grey-zone - both sides report fierce fighting here. Plekhovo is now… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Snagost, Kursk region of Russia.Ukrainian forces advanced in the forests south of Olgovka, while their DRGs operated within the town. Ukrainian focus here seems to be to bypass the city of Koronevo from the north after failing to capture it.The frontline elsewhere in Kursk remains stable after Ukrainian forces begun building fortifications and trench systems.
